successes.title: MagMod - Magnetic Speedlite Modifiers for Hot-Shoe Flashes
successes.description: MagMod is the simplest, easiest, strongest, fastest, and sexiest speedlite modifier system for Canon + Nikon hot-shoe flashes, period.

Pledges.description: Every dollar counts!  We'll give you a digital high-five and thank you for your support + all project update notifications.

T-SHIRT -- A MagnetMod T-shirt, a digital high-five and thank you, and all project project notifications.
--Free US Shipping--
MAGMOD BASIC - Get the MagGrip and MagGrid modifiers, one of each.  Go ahead, flash someone.  ---Free US Shipping--

DOUBLE KIT - Grab the Double MagMod Kit!  This award includes the (2) MagGrip, (2) MagGrid and (2) MagGel kit.
